mapper.select: select work_day from agile_work_calendar_ref where sprint_id = #{sprintId} and project_id = #{projectId} and status = 1
select work_day from agile_work_calendar_ref where sprint_id = #{sprintId} and project_id = #{projectId} and status = 0

select t.work_day from ( select awcf.work_day, sprint.start_date, case when sprint.status_code = 'closed' then sprint.actual_end_date else sprint.end_date end as end_date from agile_work_calendar_ref awcf join agile_sprint sprint on awcf.sprint_id = sprint.sprint_id where awcf.project_id = #{projectId} and awcf.status = 0 ) t where date(t.work_day) >= t.start_date and date(t.work_day) <= t.end_date
